text:
This place offers a wide range of plants to bring home a touch of nature. They recently moved to this location about 3 months ago, and the owner and staff are super friendly and helpful.

Currently, they’re running a giveaway —show their flyer to get a powerful fertilizer. Definitely worth checking out!
Very nice boquet of flowers at near Pek Kio Market and very affordable.
Beautiful plants and the prices also very reasonable. Helpful and friendly staff. Will recommend to come here to get ur plants!
Nice plants and very reasonable prices! Staff was helpful too
They have a wide variety of plants at reasonable prices, I bought a few for my living room. Highly recommended!
